texts.textentryhtml: Acquired by Melvin Holmes (1944–2013), San Francisco, California, in or after 1985 and by March 13, 1998; purchased by Lawrence Hilton, Trenton, New Jersey, after July 7, 1998 but before 2013; purchased by Princeton University Art Museum, 2024.
